mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE CTE (MENU_NO, MENU_NM, UPPER_MENU_NO, URL) AS ( SELECT MENU_NO, MENU_NM, UPPER_MENU_NO, URL FROM PT_MENU WHERE UPPER_MENU_NO = #{upperMenuNo} UNION ALL SELECT R.MENU_NO, R.MENU_NM, R.UPPER_MENU_NO, R.URL FROM PT_MENU R INNER JOIN CTE ON R.UPPER_MENU_NO = CTE.MENU_NO ) SELECT * FROM CTE ORDER BY MENU_NO ASC
